definitions.definition: A monocular optical instrument that magnifies distant objects, especially in astronomy .
Any instrument used in astronomy for observing distant objects (such as a radio telescope ).
A retractable tubular support for lights .

main_definition: A monocular optical instrument that magnifies distant objects, especially in astronomy .
secondary_definitions: Any instrument used in astronomy for observing distant objects (such as a radio telescope ).
( television ) A retractable tubular support for lights .
